Package io.github.ai4ci

Class JPanSim2

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.JPanSim2
public class JPanSim2 extends Object
Command-line entry for the simulator and a small launcher used by batch systems.

This class exposes a simple CLI for running experiments. Options accepted by the main method are:

  • -o, --output <output> — Path to the output directory. Defaults to the current working directory. A leading ~ is expanded to the invoking user's home directory.
  • -c, --config <config> — Path to the configuration JSON file. By default the launcher looks for config.json in the output directory.
Behaviour notes:
  • If the output directory does not exist it will be created (or a RuntimeException is raised if creation fails).
  • If the configuration file cannot be found a RuntimeException is raised.
  • On CLI parse errors the program prints usage help and exits (status 0) — see the printed help for SLURM usage hints.

The launcher integrates with SLURM workflows by accepting continuous batch array parameters; see the usage help printed by the program for an example invocation. For programmatic callers use SimulationMonitor and ExperimentConfiguration.readConfig(Path) directly.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String... args) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      The main entry point for a command line or SLURM batch job.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments; see the class-level Javadoc for accepted options and usage notes.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the simulation is interrupted by the user or a batch system signal. The simulation will attempt to save progress before exiting when interrupted.
      IOException - if the output directory cannot be created or the configuration file cannot be read.
